website_summaries.verdict: The BreathableBaby crib rail removes all the guesswork, with its one-size-fits-most design and hook-and-loop fasteners.
pros: Durable padded mesh with waterproof backing
Fits most wide and thin convertible style cribs
Hook and loop closure along front rail with adjustable side straps
Washer and dryer safe, and leaves no residue on the crib
cons: Company does not produce side rails to match, but some customers buy an extra cover and get creative for the most determined rail teethers

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: While this rail guard is really cute, easy to install, and stops the chewing, it is not very secure. It is held on by Velcro, which makes for easy install but my almost 10 month old started to rip it off of his crib. Since it’s breathable it’s up for debate how dangerous it may be once it is no longer secure. However, I’m not taking any chances and I’m going to take it down and look for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ringer

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I was worried it wouldn't fit over the rail on my sons crib. His railing is about 8" and at an angle. It fits perfect. I also the how it velcrows. I was also nervous my son would figure out how to pull it off but it has been a couple of months and he hasn't. Easy to install and wash. My son doesn't chew the side of his crib anymore. Very cute print.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Great quality piece.
customer_reviews.text: Our baby is 10 months old and she decided chewing on furniture while teething was a good thing. As a parent, I disagreed. I researched crib rail covers on Amazon. I was tempted to buy the version by Trend Lab because it had so many reviews. But I was drawn to something about this one by BreathableBaby. And I feel I made the right choice! The quality of the piece is excellent! I also love how easy it was able to put on the crib—just velcro the sides together. It was nice to not have ties to deal with. My one wish is for the company to make shorter ones for the side rails of the crib.
customer_reviews.author: loriandersonphoto

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.  No Straps.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice cover that stopped my son from eating the crib paint. Only negative is that you have to keep putting the Velcro back together. But I'll take that over straps.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Frances

customer_reviews.title: We really liked the mesh crib liner from this brand also
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed so the little one did not chew any more chunks off the wood rail. It fit perfectly and stays on well with the Velcro sealing the entire bottom and a Velcro strap on each side. We really liked the mesh crib liner from this brand also.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. They are easy to put on the crib railings. The white looks very nice on the white crib I keep in my house for my grandchildren. They do their job - my grandchildren can no longer bite on the wood railings -- for their own safety.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G

customer_reviews.title: There is s little pocket that is perfect for holding his pacifier
customer_reviews.text: This railguard is exactly what I was looking for. My little one loves the crib rail when he is teething and the railguard keeps the railing soft. There is s little pocket that is perfect for holding his pacifier! It's helpful at 3am when I searching for it!
customer_reviews.author: Ceeelo1

customer_reviews.title: Prevented my kid from teething on front of crib. ...
customer_reviews.text: Prevented my kid from teething on front of crib. Sides will be taken off when it turns into a bed anyways. Bought two so back is protected too.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I have a huge crib with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I have a huge crib with a super wide rail and it fits perfectly. I have also used the mesh bumpers from this company and love them as well. The Velcro is super strong and easy to use. I washed it before hand and it came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install! Protects the crib rails very well! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to teething babies, visually appealing compared to the cotton ones, and is easy to wash and put on. My only complaint is that Breathable Baby only offers a front cover but not sides. Had to buy two to cover the entire rail.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Saved a couple bumps to the head when she toppled over
customer_reviews.text: Messes clean up easily. My cat thinks it’s a scratching spot unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Faith R

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect size for our Graco crib and keeps our baby ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect size for our Graco crib and keeps our baby from biting the crib paint. He hasn't been able to take it off which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fits securely. Love the pacifier pocket! Keeps from chewing and provides a soft surface to lean/grab on.
customer_reviews.author: JayT

customer_reviews.title: teething breather rail saver
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. keeps the wood of crib intact and he loves waking up to a different toy in the pocket each morning.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pooler

customer_reviews.title: Very thin.
customer_reviews.text: We returned this crib guard because we wanted something with more padding for our teething child.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my mini crib rail. It was a little long, but we made it work. It attached to the crib with Velcro. The tabs at the end are Velcro as well to secure it to the crib rail.
customer_reviews.author: Ogee

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job - keeps baby's mouth and teeth off the wood - fits nicely/securely.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bode

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It moves a lot. Not stable. But it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: GUY KOCHLANI

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for a teething baby
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a teething baby! Soft mesh and super easy install! Just wish they had a breathablebaby sideguard
customer_reviews.author: dan shamash

customer_reviews.title: Good for teething and crib toys
customer_reviews.text: BreathableBaby Railguard was just what we were looking for. After throwing it in the wash we installed it in a few seconds. The fabric is great for a teething baby. We no longer worry about the crib being scraped or any of that getting ingested. We can easily remove the rail guard for cleaning or when we convert the crib into a bed. Another nice aspect of this rail guard is you can attach a toy to the crib (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: Tea Drinker

product_meta.title: BreathableBaby Railguard Crib Rail Cover - White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteBreathable Baby's Rail Guard Crib Rail Cover with durable padded mesh protects from chewing on the rail, getting splinters, cracks, paint chips and other chemicals. Waterproof back protects crib rail from wet and damage. Handy front pocket keeps baby's pacifier nearby. The larger size rail cover fits most wide and thin convertible style cribs. Sturdy hook-and-loop closures along front rail and adjustable side straps for quick and convenient installation and secure fit. Washer and dryer safe, and it leaves no sticky residue on the crib. This cover helps protect and prolong the life of most convertible style cribs (thick rail). White color to go with any bedding decor. Made of 100% Polyester. Product Dimensions (lying flat): 51" x 18". Package contains one rail cover.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
763 277 8484
feature_bullets: Durable, padded mesh cover protects baby from splinters, paint chips, and other chemicals and protects crib
Larger size protects most convertible style cribs (thick rail)
Waterproof back to protect crib rail from wetness
Fits Most Crib” except exceptionally large front rail cribs.
